thread.title: Great little hide a way in the heart of Times Square
thread.title_full: Great little hide a way in the heart of Times Square - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: raybQ6081MT
title: Great little hide a way in the heart of Times Square
text: We very much enjoyed staying at the Casablanca. It is a quit, comfortable boutique hotel steps from Times Square. The 2nd floor area was great to meet friends while having breakfast or enjoying a glass of wine in the evening. The staff could not have been nicer.
